body.name: Minibee Women's Linen Blouse High Low Shirt Roll-Up Sleeve Tops
features: Fabric type 45% Linen, 55% Cotton;★PS: Cotton and linen fabrics are mixed woven fabrics ,good breathability. Easy to wrinkle,before wearing and soaking with softener during cleaning can play a good effect.
Care instructions Machine wash. ★PS:Please choose the size you wear, NO need to size up.The shirt is Long Sleeve, LOOSE FIT STYLE.
Lightweight and breathable cotton linen women long sleeve shirt with roll-up sleeve with single-button closure, shirt collar
This new cotton linen shirt blouse tops is solid color,a pocket on the left chest (see detailed image)
Loose hi-low hem, pretty and fashion, simple and elegant; Can be match jeans, skinny leggings or shorts and skirt, very charming.
Suit for shopping, dating, wedding, party, or any occasions, it's leisure, daily, casual style shirts tops.

★Kindly Note:Cotton and linen fabrics are mixed woven fabrics that have sweat absorption and good breathability, but there will be some common phenomena.Easy to wrinkle, the fabric is hard.Ironing before wearing and soaking with softener during cleaning can play a good effect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 3, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I'm very confused
reviews.reviewText: I like this blouse. All of the reviews said it was small, so I sized way up as recommended to an XL. These must be large chested women. I ordinarily wear a medium and will be sending back--for a medium?? The XL is very large on me. It's as if I received a different product than some of the reviews. Very classic design and good quality. No unexpected detailing at the collar, etc. The fabric is a little coarse, but I anticipate it will soften with time. I do like the covered buttons.This review has been sitting while I decide whether to re-order in a smaller size. I read recent reviews to see if the sizing comments have changed. Everyone still says size way up, and the XL I ordered swallowed me up. I guess I will try for the medium and see how it goes. Really like the shirt. Ordered the denim blue. I'm looking for a work shirt.Update: I re-ordered size medium. Fits true to size. I am a 36A, 5‘4“ 140 pounds. This is a very well-made blouse. I would not call it a tunic, but it does fall to cover my rear end. It seems to wash well. I hang on the line to dry

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great blouse - but fits small
reviews.reviewText: This is the third blouse I have bought from Minibee - and all of them have fit differently even though they say they are the same size. One fit great, one was too big, and this one was too small! Makes it hard to purchase but I do really like the styles and prices and the fabric holds its shape well. I have not tried washing them yet, however.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 7, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very cute shirt, but NOT loose fitting.
reviews.reviewText: This is a really cute shirt. It looks really nice, and it’s good quality. A couple of things before purchasing:1. It is true to size, but it’s NOT a loose fitting shirt. If you’re looking for a flowy fit, you’ll need to size up. If you want it to fit like a regular shirt, get your regular size.2. You will have to wash it before wearing it. The material is a little rough from the linen, but if you want to soften it, you’ll have to wash it before wearing.Overall, it’s a good value. I may get another one (in a different color) in my regular size and one in a different color in one size larger for a flowy tunic.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Loved it but too small
reviews.reviewText: It’s too small… I’m taking it to UPS, for return and please send larger size..The return item was delivered to my mailbox on 12/15…. But no package was found in my mailbox! HELP!!! I need help to finds myself package!! PLEASE HELP ME TO FIND IT!I’ve been trying for HOURS TO FI ND HELP!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars If you size WAY up, then this is the perfect top 👌🏽
reviews.reviewText: I'm 5'3" 123 lb. 30D bra size, typically size small(4-6) in tops.....after reading reviews I went wayyy up in size, XL to be exact.So, bc I did my research, it fits as expected. Very loose, long body, 3/4 sleeves. In my opinion it's perfect, just as the pictures show. Blue color is true to photos, material IS a bit scratchy at first but after wearing for a short while I got used to it. I have pretty sensitive skin typically, fabrics like wool I absolutely cannot wear, but this top isn't nearly that bad, just takes a little getting used to. I also think it may soften up after a few washings....also seems to be well made, stitching is nice and neat, buttons are sewn on pretty strong. I usually put a coat of clear polish on my buttons anyway, just to give them a little extra protection (that one's for free 😘)I wish more people would take photos for their reviews, so I took 4 in the hopes that it helps future shoppers. Last one is to show what you could pair it with to make a cute outfit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Fabric is rough/scratchy
reviews.reviewText: The quality of the fabric is such a disappointment. It is rough, and scratchy.Poor fit as well. I took my measurements and compared to size guide. The length of the shirt barely covers my hips/bottom.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Fit and appearance
reviews.reviewText: I use this product for everyday wear. The fit works. It is very comfortable and looks like linen. It is a casual piece and anyone needing such a product would love it!
Buena calidad, color bonito, tela fresca pero la talla es un poco reducida
The shirt fits great! I got it in a size large because I wanted it to be oversized. I am 5"5, 112lbs The quality is not cheap but it feels like genuine linen. Recommend purchasing.
No es lo que esperaba, muy corta y la calidad de la tela no es buena, sobre todo por el precio, demasiado cara para lo que es, no me gustó.

reviews.reviewTitle: UN LADO MÁS GRANDE QUE EL OTRO
